page.title: 02Ecology-Pamber Forest
page.content: The most important ecological areas within our area are those which include{Pamber Forest}and the southern portion of{Silchester Common. {Climate.} Mean temperature: Jan.3 degrees C July 15 degrees C Annual Rainfall : 70-100 cm. Overall; mainly S.Westerly wind,mild winters,cool summers,moderate rainfall. {Brief History. Pamber Forest is a tiny fragment of what was once a royal hunting forest stretching South and West to Kingsclere and East to Windsor. Since 1951,along with Silchester Common it has been designated a grade one area for conservation.
